attributes.action: Calderdale Council to abolish charges for residents parking permits
attributes.additional_details:
People of the borough of Calderdale are fed up of our elected representatives ignoring our interests and working towards their own agendas.

This petition is to protest to the council about the recent descision to charge £25 (per permit) for residents to park outside their own homes. Whilst no one owns the road outside their property, to charge residents while others can park with impunity is unfair and simply another tax to be levied against the motorist.

No more!

rejection.details: This is, as your petition points out, a matter for the local authority.  If you are expecting central government to take action, could you make this clear in the petition.
